verbose_text: Similarly, in salt stressed aloe, Si application was reported to decrease minimum fluorescence (F O), and increase variable fluorescence (F v) and the potential activity of photosystem II (PSII), thus improving photosynthetic efficiency in aloe [XREF_BIBR].
